ygData.subject: Re: Missing Songs!!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Nah - it s gotta be Bardic (and with those undead Bards in Paineel, this would be perfect ;) Talies Dance of the Dead - targetted corpse, if within range
ygData.messageBody:
At 11:14 AM 2/15/00 -0500, you wrote:
>From: Papa Legba <legba@...>
>
>
> >
> > Hrm - what if it were line-of-sight only, sort of a targetable levitate
> > that only affects corpses?
> >
>
>Hmmm, would this mean, the corpse would float over to the party? Well
>that would be worth it for effect only... Even better if the corpse
>(with "Elfson's Corpse" still as name) would get up and walk over to the
>bard. Call it "Talies Call of the Dead" or something.


Nah - it's gotta be Bardic (and with those undead Bards in Paineel, this
would be perfect ;)
"Talies' Dance of the Dead - targetted corpse, if within range (limited to
about 100 feet or so, of course) gets up and walks to it's owner (Owner
must be within "heal" range of the Bard)"

This would be great for lava and "stuck in the wall" retrievals, but not as
powerful as the Necro summoning. Additionally, Necros could get this as a
spell at a lower level, giving them a little more power, too.

Just a thought...

Talies the Wanna-be-a-Necro
